name: Boink
description:
Boink is a game about building a money machine using falling Money and Bouncers. Money is shot out of cannons at the top, it’s up to you to increase the value until it hits the bottom. The way to do that is simple:

PURCHASE BOUNCERS AND PLACE THEM ON THE MAP


UPGRADE BOUNCERS AND THE CANNON TO BOOST VALUE


REBIRTH TO GAIN UNIQUE UPGRADES


WATCH YOUR MONEY GROW


See how much money you can get!
